testcase.name: JobApplicationReviewPage > displays error page when application fetch fails
JobApplicationReviewPage > navigates back to job when Back to Job button is clicked
JobApplicationReviewPage > generates correct avatar initials for applicant name
JobApplicationReviewPage > displays application status correctly
JobApplicationReviewPage > handles very long cover letters correctly
JobApplicationReviewPage > preserves whitespace in cover letter and special needs
JobCard > renders core job details with salary and inclusive badge
JobCard > shows up to three ethical tags and an overflow counter
JobCard > navigates to job details when the card is clicked
JobCard > navigates to workplace without triggering card navigation
JobCard > omits inclusive badge when the job is not marked inclusive
JobFilters > renders filter fields with current values
JobFilters > updates ethical tags when selection changes
JobFilters > updates salary range when slider value changes
JobFilters > updates checkbox filters and company name
ReportModal > renders correctly with required props
testcase.system-err: Warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent}.

testcase.name: JobCard > renders job card with complete data
JobCard > renders job card with minimal data
JobCard > displays ethical tags correctly
JobCard > shows truncated ethical tags with count badge when more than 3
JobCard > displays inclusive opportunity badge when enabled
JobCard > does not display inclusive opportunity badge when disabled
JobCard > displays "Remote" when job is remote
JobCard > displays workplace location when job is not remote
JobCard > displays multiple job types correctly
JobCard > navigates to job detail page when card is clicked
JobCard > navigates to workplace page when company name is clicked
JobCard > navigates to workplace page when company logo is clicked
JobCard > does not navigate to job detail when clicking company name
JobCard > generates correct avatar fallback for company name
JobCard > handles very long job titles correctly
JobCard > handles special characters in job title and company
JobCard > formats salary correctly
JobCard > handles very large salary values
JobCard > handles international location names
JobCard > displays job type as Part-time
JobCard > displays job type as Contract
JobCard > handles empty ethical tags array
JobCard > displays company logo when imageUrl is provided
JobCard > renders all job types separated by slash
JobCard > applies hover effect classes
JobCard > has correct ARIA attributes for accessibility
